docs.text:
Welcome to the Blockchain Labs


Introduction


With the popularity of cryptocurrencies (e.g., BitCoin, Ethereum, etc.), Blockchain, the backend technology that powers the cryptocurrencies, has raised to be a main-stream technique. It has the potential to disrupt many industries ranging from business, laws, finance, to many others. 




Lab: Blockchain Storage and Mining


[
lab3
]

docs.text: With the popularity of cryptocurrencies (e.g., BitCoin, Ethereum, etc.), Blockchain, the backend technology that powers the cryptocurrencies, has raised to be a main-stream technique. It has the potential to disrupt many industries ranging from business, laws, finance, to many others.
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text:
Blockchain Tx Storage Lab


Introduction


The Blockchain provides the storage of transaction history in cryptocurrency and gives us an interface of reading or writing transactions. In this lab, the learning objective is for students to have a hands-on experience and in-depth understanding of Blockchain's  transactional interface. In addition, writing a transaction in Blockchain goes throug mining. This lab also introduces the basic concept of mining. The module consists several exercises and the details are found in  [
Blockchain storage lab
].


Recommended Time




Supervised situation (e.g. a closely-guided lab session): 
1 hour


Unsupervised situation (e.g. take a home lab): 
1 week




Files that are needed




You will need the [
genesis.json
] file to execute this lab successfully.
